title: Syngenta drug screen

source.description:
Bleach worms prepared for day 1 tracking:
Adaptations:
- remix pellet after each wash

source.title: Bleach synchronisation of C. elegans

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"4f0fh","text":"Wash hermaphrodites off plate with several ml of M9 solution and transfer to 15ml falcon tube (Fisher Scientific-Falcon 352096)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"EAA5CAA6066D48108EC61B919DA84309","id":734377,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Washing"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6gje6","text":"Fill falcon tube up to 15ml with M9 solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"8CE6FC44EDB142AE88F3807D0ED9CEBF","id":734378,"previous_id":734377,"previous_guid":"EAA5CAA6066D48108EC61B919DA84309","section":"Washing"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eodli","text":"Centrifuge for 2 minutes at 1500 rpm (RCF:210, ascending 9; descending 7) \u2013 program 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"408q1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"edr02","text":"Program 1 retains the worms as pellets and the bacteria is suspended as the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"beln7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5ua7c","text":"The descending is slow as the worm pellet is lose at this stage which we don't want to break","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"5CBEC650BD2A4B86BEDC756EDAFAF1F1","id":734379,"previous_id":734378,"previous_guid":"8CE6FC44EDB142AE88F3807D0ED9CEBF","section":"Washing"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"brvgo","text":"Remove supernatant using a plastic Pasteur pipette taking care not to disturb pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8f130","text":"Leave atleast 0.5ml M9 to avoid disturbing the pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"80F3EC7BCB1841249896E6536BF06D3F","id":734380,"previous_id":734379,"previous_guid":"5CBEC650BD2A4B86BEDC756EDAFAF1F1","section":"Washing"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36rit","text":"Fill the tube with M9 upto 15ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"3DE5FA27564642D58BECA4A486588056","id":734381,"previous_id":734380,"previous_guid":"80F3EC7BCB1841249896E6536BF06D3F","section":"Washing"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4h9b5","text":"Spin program 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"F6889D9026094658B0F962BD18AED5E3","id":734382,"previous_id":734381,"previous_guid":"3DE5FA27564642D58BECA4A486588056","section":"Washing"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3k1sq","text":"Repeat steps 4-6 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":17,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"1630C0AEB73542259E08D758B4300149","id":734383,"previous_id":734382,"previous_guid":"F6889D9026094658B0F962BD18AED5E3","section":"Washing"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8jndd","text":"On final wash remove as much supernatant as possible and add M9 upto 4ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"D70AE5202894467A8F6B95AB7DD8488C","id":734384,"previous_id":734383,"previous_guid":"1630C0AEB73542259E08D758B4300149","section":"Washing"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"62r2v","text":"Vortex on maximum setting for 4 min (no more as this will damage the eggs) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6qu9k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8a6od","text":"Makesure the vortex forms ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"61r7h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"etoc6","text":"After vortexing, top up the tube with M9 till 15ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"CA219FAAAD3C4B429F5D3712844091DB","id":734386,"previous_id":734385,"previous_guid":"BE7C986A6F0941A19609D065395DA7E9","section":"Bleaching"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cahme","text":"Centrifuge for 2 mins at 2500rpm (RCF:590, ascending 9; descending 7) \u2013 program 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cj03q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"70c74","text":"(Always check the program on the centrifuge before using it)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"50161A125DF640F7AD47BBAFD5BFEEDA","id":734387,"previous_id":734386,"previous_guid":"CA219FAAAD3C4B429F5D3712844091DB","section":"Bleaching"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7khv7","text":"Remove supernatant by pouring into waste bottle \u2013 pellet should be compact and yellow in colour at bottom of falcon, but be careful not to lose","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bm3b6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f2u92","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"64FD4D8BC14E402A9BE1B0E47D79CFE5","id":734388,"previous_id":734387,"previous_guid":"50161A125DF640F7AD47BBAFD5BFEEDA","section":"Bleaching"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"65rd8","text":"Add 15ml M9","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"B62A0F4C1FA8404496FDD51E9EDABBB8","id":734389,"previous_id":734388,"previous_guid":"64FD4D8BC14E402A9BE1B0E47D79CFE5","section":"Bleaching"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"48ltj","text":"Centrifuge at program 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"DC5F2EF03D3F4BDAB2630C8CC859F6DB","id":734390,"previous_id":734389,"previous_guid":"B62A0F4C1FA8404496FDD51E9EDABBB8","section":"Bleaching"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2rd9","text":"Repeat steps 12-14 four more times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e54tp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"46ji2","text":"The number of washes is crucial here as we need to get rid of all the bleach","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9mqmn","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"B8C409813F5541358F1C184CC85F4172","id":734391,"previous_id":734390,"previous_guid":"DC5F2EF03D3F4BDAB2630C8CC859F6DB","section":"Bleaching"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7p1in","text":"Centrifuge larvae on program 2 to pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"6D12441815114B0FBFA9F1A98AD5CE56","id":734393,"previous_id":734392,"previous_guid":"63A2346ACAF9415D84BD86B1C37A1283","section":"Feeding"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"gjoo","text":"Remove supernatant with plastic Pasteur pipette","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1h9rc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a1qu2","text":"The pellet is lose here so makesure not to disturb it","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"D45543BEE715476E8FAEC77866865E09","id":734394,"previous_id":734393,"previous_guid":"6D12441815114B0FBFA9F1A98AD5CE56","section":"Feeding"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7nji7","text":"Add 15ml M9, spin to wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"5D7CAAB391AC4655BCAC462527990946","id":734395,"previous_id":734394,"previous_guid":"D45543BEE715476E8FAEC77866865E09","section":"Feeding"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75gje","text":"On final wash leave 0.5ml M9 in falcon","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"D092CD1BC4054ABC9C92FEE7A3E07F75","id":734397,"previous_id":734395,"previous_guid":"5D7CAAB391AC4655BCAC462527990946","section":"Feeding"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2qb4g","text":"Resuspend the pellet by gently tapping the tube\/flicking it","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"C8E53A23D5F74A689ABF43364109F239","id":734398,"previous_id":734397,"previous_guid":"D092CD1BC4054ABC9C92FEE7A3E07F75","section":"Feeding"}

source.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"aisuj","text":"This protocol is for obtaining synchronised populations of C. elegans. Eggs are harvested from gravid hermaphrodites and allow to grow to L1 arrest for 12-120 hours (0.5-5days). L1 larvae are then fed and left to develop to the appropriate developmental stage","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":59,"length":10,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}
Label each DESTINATION plate with the source plate the DESTINATION SLOT in the opentrons robot.
Prepare drug source plates in skirted 96 well plate so that each column corresponds to a single drug at a single concentration. The final concentration of DMSO should be 0.1%.
Run opentrons robot using prepared protocol.

source.body:
NB.
- One drug source plate with each column corresponding to a drug for use with a multichannel pipette.
- Destination and source plate locations are specified.
- The opentrons robot will randomise the column locations from each source plate to a destination plate
- The date is used as the random seed

source.description:
Protocol parameters:
# multichannel pipette parameters and tipracks
multi_pipette_type = 'p10-Multi'
multi_pipette_mount = 'left'
tiprackdrugs_slots = ['3']
tiprackdrugs_type = 'opentrons-tiprack-10ul'
tiprackdrugs_startfrom = '1'
tiprackH2O_slot = '6'
tiprackH2O_type = 'opentrons-tiprack-10ul'
# tiprackH2O_startfrom = '1'
# water trough
H2O_source_slot = '9'
H2O_source_type = 'trough-12row'
H2O_source_well = 'A1'
H2O_volume = 5
# drugs source
drugs_source_slots = '2'#,'5','8','11']
drugs_source_type = '96-well-plate-pcr-thermofisher'
frombottom_off = +0.3 # mm from bottom of src wells
drugs_volume = 3
# destination plates
agar_thickness = +3.7 # mm from the bottom of the well for 200ul agar per well
destination_slots = ['1','4','7', '5']
destination_type = '96-well-plate-sqfb-whatman'
n_columns = 12
# create mapping from sources to destination.
seed = 20191031 # for reproducibility. Let's use the experimental date for the actual experiment, something else for debugging
np.random.seed(seed)
Make sure all labware is loaded correctly
Run protocol and monitor robot to ensure all the tips are removed
Tip racks have to replaced after each destination plate is filled
Allow the plates to dry for 30 minutes

Use VIAFILL dispenser to dispense
1:10 diluted OP50 into each well of each drug plate
Allow to dry for 30 minutes under the flow hood
Keep at room temperature over night (covered in the dark as some drugs are light-sensitive)
Wash worms off the 150mm plates with M9 using a pasteur pipette into 15ml falcons

Spin at
for 2 minutes to pellet the worms
Remove supernatent and fill M9
Repeats steps 12-13 two more times
After final wash fill falcon with M9, transfer contents of 15mL falcons to 50mL and fill up to 45mL with M9.
Use wormsorter to dispense 2 worms per well
Allow liquid to dry off the plates for 30 mins under the flow hood
Incubate in drug for 4 hours
Hydra tracking : 15 mins 25fps, exposure 25000msec

source.title: Pick L4 worms for bleaching (-9 days)

source.description: Pick L4 worms onto 4 x OP50-seeded NGM 90mm plates (10 worms per plate) for day 1 of tracking

At 17:00
Refeed L1s for day 1 tracking onto 5 x 150mm plates as in protocol above by dropping 4 small droplets around the edges of the plate (off food).
Wash worms once before refeeding
Keep worms at

At 17:00
Refeed L1s for day 2 tracking onto 5 x 150mm plates as in protocol above by dropping 4 small droplets around the edges of the plate (off food).
Wash worms once before refeeding
Keep worms at

Bleach worms prepared for day 2 tracking and keep at
in rotatotor until refeeding:
Adaptations:
- remix pellet after each wash

source.title: Pick L4 worms for bleaching and pour 96WPs (- 8 days)

source.description:
Once agar has cooled and salts have been added pour agar into 65 x 96 well plates using VIAFILL dispenser. Dispense
per well. Once cooled, store lidside down in airtight container at
.

source.title: Pick L4 worms for bleaching and pour 96WPs (- 8 days)

source.description: Prepare 1.5L low peptone NGM and autoclave

source.title: Pick L4 worms for bleaching and pour 96WPs (- 8 days)

source.description: Pick L4 worms onto 4 x OP50-seeded NGM 90mm plates (10 worms per plate) for day 2 of tracking
Weigh 3 random plates
Place in flow hood for 3 hours to allow to dry (with lids off)
Weigh 3 random plates

Use VIAFLO to fill 30 x SOURCE plates with
water and
drug from STOCK plates.

description: Protocol for preparing worms, preparing drug plates, dispensing worms with wormsorter and tracking on Hydra rigs
